scripts.build: echo "BUILD SCRIPT STARTED - CWD: $(pwd)" && echo "Ensuring CWD is /workspace for core operations..." && if [ "$(pwd)" != "/workspace" ]; then cd /workspace; else echo "Already in /workspace"; fi && echo "Removing existing /workspace/node_modules (if any)..." && rm -rf /workspace/node_modules && echo "Running pnpm install (using npx pnpm@8.15.5, force, frozen lockfile, debug loglevel) from /workspace..." && npx pnpm@8.15.5 install --force --frozen-lockfile --loglevel debug && echo "Listing /workspace/node_modules/.bin AFTER pnpm install to confirm nx shim..." && ls -la /workspace/node_modules/.bin && echo "Running nx build test-app from /workspace using direct call to /workspace/node_modules/.bin/nx..." && /workspace/node_modules/.bin/nx build test-app --configuration=production && echo "BUILD SCRIPT FINISHED."
scripts.start: echo "START SCRIPT STARTED - CWD: $(pwd)" && echo "Ensuring CWD is /workspace for core operations..." && if [ "$(pwd)" != "/workspace" ]; then cd /workspace; else echo "Already in /workspace"; fi && /workspace/node_modules/.bin/serve -s dist/apps/test-app/browser -l tcp://0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8080}
